description: Detects the execution of certutil with certain flags that allow the utility to download files from file-sharing websites.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Suspicious File Downloaded From File-Sharing Website Via Certutil.EXE
query: (event.category:process AND ((process.executable:/.*\\[Cc][Ee][Rr][Tt][Uu][Tt][Ii][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:/[Cc][Ee][Rr][Tt][Uu][Tt][Ii][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) AND process.command_line:(/.*[Uu][Rr][Ll][Cc][Aa][Cc][Hh][Ee]\ .*/ OR /.*[Vv][Ee][Rr][Ii][Ff][Yy][Cc][Tt][Ll]\ .*/) AND process.command_line:(/.*\.[Gg][Ii][Tt][Hh][Uu][Bb][Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Ee][Nn][Tt]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm].*/ OR /.*[Aa][Nn][Oo][Nn][Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm].*/ OR /.*[Cc][Dd][Nn]\.[Dd][Ii][Ss][Cc][Oo][Rr][Dd][Aa][Pp][Pp]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm].*/ OR /.*[Cc][Dd][Nn]\.[Dd][Ii][Ss][Cc][Oo][Rr][Dd][Aa][Pp][Pp]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]\/[Aa][Tt][Tt][Aa][Cc][Hh][Mm][Ee][Nn][Tt][Ss]\/.*/ OR /.*[Dd][Dd][Nn][Ss]\.[Nn][Ee][Tt].*/ OR /.*[Dd][Ll]\.[Dd][Rr][Oo][Pp][Bb][Oo][Xx][Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Ee][Nn][Tt]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm].*/ OR /.*[Gg][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt][Bb][Ii][Nn]\.[Cc][Oo].*/ OR /.*[Gg][Oo][Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee]\.[Ii][Oo].*/ OR /.*[Hh][Aa][Ss][Tt][Ee][Bb][Ii][Nn]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm].*/ OR /.*[Mm][Ee][Dd][Ii][Aa][Ff][Ii][Rr][Ee]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm].*/ OR /.*[Mm][Ee][Gg][Aa]\.[Nn][Zz].*/ OR /.*[Pp][Aa][Ss][Tt][Ee]\.[Ee][Ee].*/ OR /.*[Pp][Aa][Ss][Tt][Ee][Bb][Ii][Nn]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm].*/ OR /.*[Pp][Aa][Ss][Tt][Ee][Bb][Ii][Nn]\.[Pp][Ll].*/ OR /.*[Pp][Aa][Ss][Tt][Ee][Tt][Ee][Xx][Tt]\.[Nn][Ee][Tt].*/ OR /.*[Pp][Rr][Ii][Vv][Aa][Tt][Ll][Aa][Bb]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm].*/ OR /.*[Pp][Rr][Ii][Vv][Aa][Tt][Ll][Aa][Bb]\.[Nn][Ee][Tt].*/ OR /.*[Ss][Ee][Nn][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Pp][Ll][Oo][Ii][Tt]\.[Ii][Nn].*/ OR /.*[Ss][Ee][Nn][Dd][Ss][Pp][Aa][Cc][Ee]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm].*/ OR /.*[Ss][Tt][Oo][Rr][Aa][Gg][Ee]\.[Gg][Oo][Oo][Gg][Ll][Ee][Aa][Pp][Ii][Ss]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm].*/ OR /.*[Ss][Tt][Oo][Rr][Jj][Ss][Hh][Aa][Rr][Ee]\.[Ii][Oo].*/ OR /.*[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\.[Ss][Hh].*/ OR /.*[Tt][Rr][Aa][Nn][Ss][Ff][Ee][Rr]\.[Ss][Hh].*/ OR /.*[Uu][Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee]\.[Ii][Oo].*/))
